arts.ttl: Barcelona defender misses training before Olympiacos game after feeling unwell
arts.sum: As Barcelona carry out their final preparations for tomorrow’s UEFA Champions League game against Olympiacos, there are several notable absentees from the training session. Players like Robert Lewandowski, Gavi, Dani Olmo, Joan Garcia, and Marc-Andre ter Stegen are all injured and out of the game. Meanwhile, Raphinha and Ferran Torres are also still not training […] The post Barcelona defender misses training before Olympiacos game after feeling unwell appeared first on Barca Universal.

arts.ttl: Barcelona attacking duo still not training with group; out of Olympiacos clash
arts.sum: Following their hard-fought win over Girona in La Liga, FC Barcelona turn their attention to the UEFA Champions League as they face Olympiacos on Tuesday night. Following their defeat to PSG in the last European matchday, it is imperative for Hansi Flick & co. to bounce back to winning ways and stay on track for […] The post Barcelona attacking duo still not training with group; out of Olympiacos clash appeared first on Barca Universal.
